title: Ticket #2143: StartD ClassAD to contain info from the Windows Performance Registry
description: StartD on Windows should have the ability to including information from the Windows Performance Registry in its machine ClassAd.
remarks:
2011-Aug-05 12:08:06 by tannenba:
Code Reviewed by tannenba.

Minor comments (not worth churning code): too much procedural code in header files, use pre-existing hash functions, use strdup instead of _strdup, add system header files into condor_common.h.

More importantly, this functionality needs documentation (sub-ticket created) and a brief synopsis at top o ticket.
derived_tickets: #2358   Need documentation of STARTD_PUBLISH_WINREG param
check_ins: 2011-May-10 14:41   Check-in [21822]: ===VersionHistory===Add support for publishing information from windows performance registry in the STARTD ClassAd #2143. ===VersionHistory===Add support for publishing the list of supported .NET versions in the STARTD ClassAd #1930 (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
creator: johnkn
